message:
This is a GREAT video about the Task Parallel Library (TPL), and what C# 5 (.NET 4.5) adds on top of it. It tells you how much you "may" be underestimating the magic AND POWER of async/await features, with a great (not too) simple example.
Found at http://blog.michaelckennedy.net/2012/07/23/asynchronous-programming-in-net-4-5-video/
name: Asynchronous Programming in .NET 4.5 (async and await)
description: This video is a recorded version of a webcast I recently finished. It will dig into the latest features for asynchronous programming in .NET and examine some...
